item.description:
We're talking about clothes that you no longer wear and you always wanted to bring to a consignment shop.
The plan is to bring these clean, wearable, women's things, (no children's or men's clothes) along with jewelry, handbags and shoes and swap with your baby boomer friends. There is also the option of selling your articles to the group.
Go ahead and price them out. The idea is to have fun, trade out some great outfits, enjoy refreshments, and if you'd like, bring a beverage, hard or soft.

We're renting the fabulous clubhouse at Bedford Springs. This is the next 128 exit near the Burlington Mall. The meetup fee charge is to offset the room rental, refreshments, and other expenses.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: The Great Swap - Clothing, Jewelry, Shoes, Bags
